Description: This 2015 Epiphone Les Paul Standard Plus Top PRO Electric Guitar is very much in like-new condition. It is not a factory second or a refurbished model. There are no dings, dents, scratches, or any wear on the guitar and it still has the original hang tags and stickers intact! The guitar is all-original and will arrive professionally set up and ready to play right out of the box. The action is low and comfortable, and the frets are pristine. This listing will come complete with an Epiphone hardshell case which is also in new condition. Awesome deal on a beautiful Les Paul! The Epiphone Les Paul Standard Plustop PRO rivals the greatest Les Pauls of any era with a AAA Flame Maple Veneer top and critically acclaimed ProBucker™ humbucker pickups. FEATURES:Solid Mahogany BodyAAA Flamed Maple Top VeneerMahogany Neck1960's SlimTaper D Profile Neck24.75" ScaleEpiphone ProBucker 2 Neck PickupEpiphone ProBucker 3 Bridge Pickup2 Volume/ 2 Tone Controls3 Way Selector SwitchPush/ Pull Coil SplitsCream Body and Neck BindingMedium Jumbo FretsLockTone BridgeGrover 18:1 Tuning MachinesSingle Ply PickguardEpiphone Tolex Hardshell Case
